name: Space choice and bottleneck
description:
I made this very short and straightforward interactive fiction as a portfolio prompt, as Samantha Webb advised to in his june newsletter. 

Here are the instructions for writing it:

  • Theme: Scifi, on board a spaceship
  • Write a scene where the player needs to do or get something, and give them two different choices to achieve their goal
  • Your scene should start the same for every player, and whatever choice your player picks in the middle, end the same for every player
